name: Unsigned Hero
description:
Fight your way higher and higher through the dungeon. Make it to the 255th level to escape! Defeat all the enemies on a floor and you will ascend up a level. Die and you will go deeper down a level. (Hmm 255 levels is a lot. I wonder if there's a faster way...)

Controls
  • X - Attack
  • Arrow Keys - Move
Hints Failure is a stepping stone to success
– Anonymous About

Created for TriJam #117
Theme: Crappy Developers / Don't learn from mistakes - repeat!
Development Time: 3h 45m 49s

Also submitted to Ludum Dare 48
Theme: Deeper and Deeper

Source Code: On GitHub
